author: Choo Han Teck J:
casename: Sumio Sakata and Others v Fuminori Paul Naruse and Others
counsel: Edmund Kronenburg and Adrian Ng (Tan Peng Chin LLC) for second and fourth plaintiffs; Ronald Choo (Rajah and Tann) for first and third plaintiffs; Tan Kok Quan SC and Audrey Thng (Tan Kok Quan Partnership) for second defendant; Suresh Nair (Allen and Gledhill) for first, third, fourth and 11th defendants
tags-parsed: Civil Procedure/Interim orders/Security for costs/Variation of security of costs order upon change of solicitors/Whether appellate interference with exercise of discretion warranted/Whether the provision of a further sum as security necessary/Whether apportionment from original sum adequate.
